title: Squalane Glow Moisturizer
subtitle: Niacinamide + Vitamin C For Bright, Even-Toned Skin
description:
Size: Net Wt.: 50.0 gm | 1.8 oz.

Suitable for: All Skin Types

Squalane Glow Moisturizer with Niacinamide & Vitamin C is an ultra-hydrating repair blend that reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while making the skin glow. A rich and decadent gel crème with all the moisture and good fats (lipids) your skin needs, without leaving a greasy feel. At the heart of the formulation is squalane that supports the skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving skin exceptionally soft and supple. Niacinamide and Vitamin C in this fast-absorbing, no-mess moisturizer work together to boost radiance for a dewy, healthy-looking complexion. Discover beautiful radiant skin!

Additional Information: Manufactured By: Naturis Cosmetics Pvt. Ltd, 1-EPIP, SIDCO Industrial Complex, Bari Brahmana, Jammu (J&K), India - 181133
Country of Origin: India
Marketed in India By: Heavenly Secrets Pvt. Ltd., 74 Technopark, MIDC, Andheri (E), Mumbai, India - 400093

title: 24K Gold Serum - 20ml
subtitle: Discover Bright & Radiant Skin
description:
Size: Net Vol.: 20.0 ml | 0.7 fl. oz.

Suitable for: All Skin Types | Dermatologically Tested | Non-comedogenic

The Pilgrim 24K Gold Serum is an innovative formulation that can be used in skincare & make-up routines. The water-based serum is absorbed quickly into the skin, making it visibly bright, calm, & plump. Expertly crafted with radiance-inducing Gold leaf and skin-enhancing ingredients like Mulberry extract, Niacinamide & Hyaluronic acid, the serum brightens and gives the skin a youthful glow. The ultrafine Gold particles provide a luminous sheen and visibly reduce redness. They promote the production of collagen and microcirculation, keeping the skin firm & healthy. Shields against sun damage to prevent photoaging. Mulberry is a rich source of Vitamin C and antioxidative phytonutrients that brighten and protect the skin. Niacinamide strengthens the skin barrier function, reduces the appearance of pores, and regulates sebum production. So, it reduces breakouts and helps the skin remain free from blemishes. Hyaluronic Acid is a skincare superhero that deeply hydrates and fills out fine lines & wrinkles. It pulls in moisture to plump up the skin. The resultant high saturation of water just beneath the surface creates the "Glass Skin" effect that is all about that healthy, reflective glow. The versatile serum can be used before applying heavier complexion products for a smooth, crease-free, and dewy finish. Use it as a make-up primer to get the beautiful "Glass-Skin" effect now!

Additional Information: Manufactured By: Naturis Cosmetics Pvt. Ltd, 1-EPIP, SIDCO Industrial Complex, Bari Brahmana, Jammu (J&K), India - 181133
Country of Origin: India
Marketed in India By: Heavenly Secrets Pvt. Ltd., 74 Technopark, MIDC, Andheri (E), Mumbai, India - 400093

title: HRX by Hrithik Roshan
subtitle: Men White And SeaDeep Blue Memory Foam Technology Running Shoes
description:
About the brand: Combining functionality with style, the HRX collection is made for the modern man who loves to stay active. These running shoes feature a lightweight design with a comfortable fit, perfect for long runs and workouts.

Product Details:
A pair of white and sea-deep blue running sports shoes, has regular styling, lace-up detail.
Mesh upper.
Cushioned footbed.
Textured and patterned outsole.
Warranty: 1 month

Additional Information: These shoes feature memory foam technology for extra cushioning and support, ensuring comfort with every step.

title: iPhone 15 Pro
subtitle: Apple iPhone 15 Pro (128 GB) - Blue Titanium
description:
FORGED IN TITANIUM — iPhone 15 Pro has a strong and light aerospace-grade titanium design with a textured matte-glass back. It also features a Ceramic Shield front that’s tougher than any smartphone glass. And it’s splash, water, and dust resistant.

ADVANCED DISPLAY — The 6.1” Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion ramps up refresh rates to 120Hz when you need exceptional graphics performance. Dynamic Island bubbles up alerts and Live Notifications. Plus, with Always-On display, your Lock Screen stays glanceable, so you don’t have to tap it to stay in the know.

GAME-CHANGING A17 PRO CHIP — A Pro-class GPU makes mobile games feel so immersive, with rich environments and realistic characters. A17 Pro is also incredibly efficient and helps to deliver amazing all-day battery life.

POWERFUL PRO CAMERA SYSTEM — Get incredible framing flexibility with 7 pro lenses. Capture super high-resolution photos with more color and detail using the 48MP Main camera. And take sharper close-ups from farther away.

CUSTOMIZABLE ACTION BUTTON — Action button is a fast track to your favorite feature. Just set the one you want, like Silent mode, Camera, Voice Memo, Shortcut, and more. Then press and hold to launch the action.

title: Apple Watch SE
subtitle: Apple Watch SE GPS, 40mm Midnight Aluminium Case with Midnight Sport Band - S/M
description:
Full Name and Address of the Manufacturer

CHINA, THAILAND

title: Apple iPad Mini
subtitle: with A15 Bionic chip, 21.08 cm (8.3″) Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Space Grey
description:
WHY IPAD MINI — The full iPad experience designed to fit in one hand. With an 21.08 cm (8.3″) Liquid Retina display, powerful A15 Bionic chip, 12MP Ultra Wide front camera with Centre Stage, USB-C connectivity and ultra-fast Wi-Fi. Take notes, mark up documents, and edit photos and videos.

IPADOS + APPS — iPadOS makes iPad more productive, intuitive and versatile. With iPadOS, run multiple apps at once, use Apple Pencil to write in any text field with Scribble, and edit and share photos. iPad mini comes with essential apps like Safari, Messages and Keynote, with over a million more apps available on the App Store.

FAST WI-FI CONNECTIVITY — Wi-Fi 6 gives you fast access to your files, uploads and downloads, and lets you seamlessly stream your favourite shows.

PERFORMANCE AND STORAGE — The A15 Bionic chip delivers powerful performance and blazing-fast graphics. And with all-day battery life, iPad mini is always ready for any task or project. Choose from 64GB or 256GB storage options depending on the room you need for apps, music, movies and more.

APPLE PENCIL AND SMART FOLIO — With Apple Pencil (2nd generation), iPad mini transforms into the world’s best note‑taking device. To protect your iPad mini and easily prop it up, you can use the slim Smart Folio covers, available in five colours. (Accessories are sold separately.)
